data.lyric:
[ti:Breaking Me]
[ar:Topic/A7S]
[al:Breaking Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Breaking Me - Topic/A7S
[00:01.38]Lyrics by：Molly Irvine/Alexander Tidebrink/René Miller/Tobias Topic
[00:02.77]Composed by：Molly Irvine/Alexander Tidebrink/René Miller/Tobias Topic
[00:04.16]Call me what you wanna
[00:05.67]I'll be what you wanna
[00:07.15]I've been here a thousand times
[00:10.98]Eh eh
[00:12.02]Fallin' for another
[00:13.58]I don't even bother
[00:15.04]I could do it all my life
[00:18.63]So tell me if you wanna
[00:20.62]Cuz I got this feeling
[00:22.63]I wanna hear you say it
[00:24.60]Cause I can't believe it
[00:26.54]With every touch of you
[00:28.07]It's like I've started dreaming
[00:30.49]Guess heaven's not the far away
[00:34.45]And I'll be singing
[00:35.63]La la la la la la la la
[00:38.29]You're breaking me
[00:39.61]La la la la la la la la
[00:42.28]You're breaking me
[00:43.58]La la la la la la la la
[00:46.21]You're breaking me
[00:47.46]La la la la la la la la
[00:50.36]I'm just right here dancing around to the rhythm
[00:54.05]The rhythm that you play when you're breaking my heart
[00:58.26]You know that I can't get you out of my system
[01:01.97]Yeah right from the start you play with my heart
[01:05.85]And I'll be singing
[01:07.12]La la la la la la la la
[01:09.90]You're breaking me
[01:11.02]La la la la la la la la
[01:13.72]You're breaking me
[01:14.94]La la la la la la la la
[01:17.62]You're breaking me
[01:18.86]La la la la la la la la
[01:21.60]You're breaking me
[01:22.87]You can do whatever
[01:24.32]I'll be here forever
[01:25.82]Spinning round inside this room
[01:29.54]Eh eh
[01:30.72]Won't you come on over
[01:32.27]I'm a sucker for ya
[01:33.64]Wishing we'll be out here soon
[01:37.34]So tell me if you wanna
[01:39.36]Cuz I got this feeling
[01:41.28]I wanna hear you say it
[01:43.21]Cause I can't believe it
[01:45.19]With every touch of you
[01:46.75]It's like I've started dreaming
[01:49.18]Guess heaven's not the far away
[01:53.24]And I'll be singing
[01:54.33]La la la la la la la la
[01:56.97]You're breaking me
[01:58.22]La la la la la la la la
[02:00.94]You're breaking me
[02:02.18]La la la la la la la la
[02:04.82]You're breaking me
[02:06.13]La la la la la la la la
[02:08.96]I'm just right here dancing around to the rhythm
[02:12.70]The rhythm that you play when you're breaking my heart
[02:16.91]You know that I can't get you out of my system
[02:20.59]Yeah right from the start you play with my heart
[02:24.59]And I'll be singing
[02:25.80]La la la la la la la la
[02:28.45]You're breaking me
[02:29.75]La la la la la la la la
[02:32.42]You're breaking me
[02:33.64]La la la la la la la la
[02:36.34]You're breaking me
[02:37.57]La la la la la la la la
[02:40.28]You're breaking me
